# The Writers' Haven - React Single Page Website

This is a React single-page website for "The Writers' Haven" - a writing services company. The website includes:

- Hero section with background image and call-to-action
- About section with feature highlights
- Team section with member profiles
- Services section with service descriptions
- Portfolio section with image gallery
- Contact section with form and contact information

## Design Requirements

- Dark theme with blue (#3498db) accent color
- Fully responsive design
- FontAwesome icons throughout
- Single page application (no routing)
- Exact clone of provided design mockups

## Development Progress

- [x] Project setup initiated
- [ ] React structure created
- [ ] Components implemented
- [ ] Styling completed
- [ ] FontAwesome icons added
- [ ] Testing and optimization
